00023 #include "MessageUtil.h"

00025 
00026 void *get_in_addr(struct sockaddr *sa)
00027 {
00028     if (sa->sa_family == AF_INET) {
00029         return &(((struct sockaddr_in*)sa)->sin_addr);
00030     }
00031 
00032     return &(((struct sockaddr_in6*)sa)->sin6_addr);
00033 }
00034 
00035 string MessageUtil::getSubscriber() const
00036 {
00037         return this->subscriber;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void MessageUtil::setSubscriber(string subscriber)
00041 {
00042         this->subscriber = subscriber;
00043 }
00044 
00045 MessageUtil::MessageUtil(string file)
00046 {
00047         XmlParser parser("Parser");
00048         Document doc = parser.getDocument(file);
00049         Element msgng = doc.getRootElement();
00050         Element dest = msgng.getElementByName("destination");
00051         Element url = msgng.getElementByName("url");
00052         vector<string> vec;
00053         string h = url.getText();
00054         boost::iter_split(vec, h , boost::first_finder(":"));
00055         this->host = vec.at(0);
00056         this->port = vec.at(1);
00057         this->destination.setName(dest.getAttribute("name"));
00058         this->destination.setType(dest.getAttribute("type"));
00059 }
00060 
00061 MessageUtil::~MessageUtil()
00062 {
00063 
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool MessageUtil::sendMessage(Message msg)
00067 {
00068         int sockfd, numbytes;
00069         char buf[100];
00070         struct addrinfo hints, *servinfo, *p;
00071         int rv;
00072         char s[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00073 
00074         memset(&hints, 0, sizeof hints);
00075         hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00076         hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00077 
00078         if ((rv = getaddrinfo(this->host.c_str(), this->port.c_str(), &hints, &servinfo)) != 0) {
00079                 fprintf(stderr, "getaddrinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(rv));
00080                 return 1;
00081         }
00082 
00083         // loop through all the results and connect to the first we can
00084         for(p = servinfo; p != NULL; p = p->ai_next) {
00085                 if ((sockfd = socket(p->ai_family, p->ai_socktype,
00086                                 p->ai_protocol)) == -1) {
00087                         perror("client: socket");
00088                         continue;
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 if (connect(sockfd, p->ai_addr, p->ai_addrlen) == -1) {
00092                         close(sockfd);
00093                         perror("client: connect");
00094                         continue;
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 break;
00098         }
00099 
00100         if (p == NULL) {
00101                 fprintf(stderr, "client: failed to connect\n");
00102                 return 2;
00103         }
00104 
00105         inet_ntop(p->ai_family, get_in_addr((struct sockaddr *)p->ai_addr),
00106                         s, sizeof s);
00107         printf("client: connecting to %s\n", s);
00108 
00109         freeaddrinfo(servinfo); // all done with this structure
00110 
00111         string h = msg.toXml();
00112         bool flag = true;
00113         if (send(sockfd, h.c_str(), h.length(), 0) == -1)
00114         {
00115                 cout << "send failed" << flush;
00116                 flag = false;
00117         }
00118         cout << h << flush;
00119 
00120         if ((numbytes = recv(sockfd, buf, 99, 0)) == -1) {
00121                 perror("recv");
00122                 exit(1);
00123         }
00124 
00125         buf[numbytes] = '\0';
00126         printf("client: received '%s'\n",buf);
00127         close(sockfd);
00128         memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00129         return flag;
00130 }
00131 
00132 Message MessageUtil::receiveMessage()
00133 {
00134         int sockfd, numbytes;
00135         char buf[1024];
00136         struct addrinfo hints, *servinfo, *p;
00137         int rv;
00138         char s[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00139 
00140         memset(&hints, 0, sizeof hints);
00141         hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00142         hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00143 
00144         if ((rv = getaddrinfo(this->host.c_str(), this->port.c_str(), &hints, &servinfo)) != 0) {
00145                 fprintf(stderr, "getaddrinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(rv));
00146         }
00147 
00148         // loop through all the results and connect to the first we can
00149         for(p = servinfo; p != NULL; p = p->ai_next) {
00150                 if ((sockfd = socket(p->ai_family, p->ai_socktype,
00151                                 p->ai_protocol)) == -1) {
00152                         perror("client: socket");
00153                         continue;
00154                 }
00155 
00156                 if (connect(sockfd, p->ai_addr, p->ai_addrlen) == -1) {
00157                         close(sockfd);
00158                         perror("client: connect");
00159                         continue;
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 break;
00163         }
00164 
00165         if (p == NULL) {
00166                 fprintf(stderr, "client: failed to connect\n");
00167         }
00168 
00169         inet_ntop(p->ai_family, get_in_addr((struct sockaddr *)p->ai_addr),
00170                         s, sizeof s);
00171         printf("client: connecting to %s\n", s);
00172 
00173         freeaddrinfo(servinfo); // all done with this structure
00174 
00175         string h = "GET FROM "+this->destination.getName()+":"+this->destination.getType();
00176         if(this->destination.getType()=="Topic")
00177                 h += ("-" + this->getSubscriber());
00178         bool flag = true;
00179         if (send(sockfd, h.c_str(), h.length(), 0) == -1)
00180         {
00181                 cout << "send failed" << flush;
00182                 flag = false;
00183         }
00184         cout << h << flush;
00185 
00186         if ((numbytes = recv(sockfd, buf, 1024, 0)) == -1) {
00187                 perror("recv");
00188                 exit(1);
00189         }
00190         string temp,results;
00191         stringstream ss;
00192         ss << buf;
00193         while(getline(ss,temp))
00194         {
00195                 cout << temp << flush;
00196                 results += temp;
00197         }
00198         cout << "\n\nclient: received" << flush;
00199         cout << results << flush;
00200         Message msg(results);
00201         buf[numbytes] = '\0';
00202 
00203         close(sockfd);
00204         memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00205         return msg;
00206 }

00214 void MessageUtil::subscribe(string subs)
00215 {
00216         if(this->destination.getType()=="Topic")
00217         {
00218                 int sockfd, numbytes;
00219                 char buf[1024];
00220                 struct addrinfo hints, *servinfo, *p;
00221                 int rv;
00222                 char s[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00223 
00224                 memset(&hints, 0, sizeof hints);
00225                 hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00226                 hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00227 
00228                 if ((rv = getaddrinfo(this->host.c_str(), this->port.c_str(), &hints, &servinfo)) != 0) {
00229                         fprintf(stderr, "getaddrinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(rv));
00230                 }
00231 
00232                 // loop through all the results and connect to the first we can
00233                 for(p = servinfo; p != NULL; p = p->ai_next) {
00234                         if ((sockfd = socket(p->ai_family, p->ai_socktype,
00235                                         p->ai_protocol)) == -1) {
00236                                 perror("client: socket");
00237                                 continue;
00238                         }
00239 
00240                         if (connect(sockfd, p->ai_addr, p->ai_addrlen) == -1) {
00241                                 close(sockfd);
00242                                 perror("client: connect");
00243                                 continue;
00244                         }
00245 
00246                         break;
00247                 }
00248 
00249                 if (p == NULL) {
00250                         fprintf(stderr, "client: failed to connect\n");
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 inet_ntop(p->ai_family, get_in_addr((struct sockaddr *)p->ai_addr),
00254                                 s, sizeof s);
00255                 printf("client: connecting to %s\n", s);
00256 
00257                 freeaddrinfo(servinfo); // all done with this structure
00258 
00259                 string h = "SUBSCRIBE "+subs+" TO "+this->destination.getName()+":"+this->destination.getType();
00260                 bool flag = true;
00261                 if (send(sockfd, h.c_str(), h.length(), 0) == -1)
00262                 {
00263                         cout << "send failed" << flush;
00264                         flag = false;
00265                 }
00266                 cout << h << flush;
00267 
00268                 if ((numbytes = recv(sockfd, buf, 1024, 0)) == -1) {
00269                         perror("recv");
00270                         exit(1);
00271                 }
00272                 string temp,results;
00273                 stringstream ss;
00274                 ss << buf;
00275                 while(getline(ss,temp))
00276                 {
00277                         cout << temp << flush;
00278                         results += temp;
00279                 }
00280                 cout << "\n\nclient: received" << flush;
00281                 cout << results << flush;
00282                 buf[numbytes] = '\0';
00283                 close(sockfd);
00284                 memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00285         }
00286 }

00288 void MessageUtil::unSubscribe(string subs)
00289 {
00290         if(this->destination.getType()=="Topic")
00291         {
00292                 int sockfd, numbytes;
00293                 char buf[1024];
00294                 struct addrinfo hints, *servinfo, *p;
00295                 int rv;
00296                 char s[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00297 
00298                 memset(&hints, 0, sizeof hints);
00299                 hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00300                 hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00301 
00302                 if ((rv = getaddrinfo(this->host.c_str(), this->port.c_str(), &hints, &servinfo)) != 0) {
00303                         fprintf(stderr, "getaddrinfo: %s\n", gai_strerror(rv));
00304                 }
00305 
00306                 // loop through all the results and connect to the first we can
00307                 for(p = servinfo; p != NULL; p = p->ai_next) {
00308                         if ((sockfd = socket(p->ai_family, p->ai_socktype,
00309                                         p->ai_protocol)) == -1) {
00310                                 perror("client: socket");
00311                                 continue;
00312                         }
00313 
00314                         if (connect(sockfd, p->ai_addr, p->ai_addrlen) == -1) {
00315                                 close(sockfd);
00316                                 perror("client: connect");
00317                                 continue;
00318                         }
00319 
00320                         break;
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 if (p == NULL) {
00324                         fprintf(stderr, "client: failed to connect\n");
00325                 }
00326 
00327                 inet_ntop(p->ai_family, get_in_addr((struct sockaddr *)p->ai_addr),
00328                                 s, sizeof s);
00329                 printf("client: connecting to %s\n", s);
00330 
00331                 freeaddrinfo(servinfo); // all done with this structure
00332 
00333                 string h = "UNSUBSCRIBE "+subs+" TO "+this->destination.getName()+":"+this->destination.getType();
00334                 bool flag = true;
00335                 if (send(sockfd, h.c_str(), h.length(), 0) == -1)
00336                 {
00337                         cout << "send failed" << flush;
00338                         flag = false;
00339                 }
00340                 cout << h << flush;
00341 
00342                 if ((numbytes = recv(sockfd, buf, 1024, 0)) == -1) {
00343                         perror("recv");
00344                         exit(1);
00345                 }
00346                 string temp,results;
00347                 stringstream ss;
00348                 ss << buf;
00349                 while(getline(ss,temp))
00350                 {
00351                         cout << temp << flush;
00352                         results += temp;
00353                 }
00354                 cout << "\n\nclient: received" << flush;
00355                 cout << results << flush;
00356                 buf[numbytes] = '\0';
00357 
00358                 close(sockfd);
00359                 memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00360         }
